___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___useContentFilter.description: Set to true to try to automatically filter content.

___filterBlacklist.description: If specified and restrictWeb is true, an array of URLs of Websites never to be allowed.

___siteWhitelist.description: Required if whiteListEnabled is true. If specified, this key contains an array of dictionaries that define additional allowed sites besides those in the automated list of allowed and unallowed sites, including disallowed adult sites.

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

___whitelistEnabled.description: Set to true to use the filterWhiteList and filterBlackList lists.

___filterWhitelist.description: If specified and restrictWeb is true, an array of URLs designating the only allowed Websites.

___restrictWeb.description: Set to true to enable Web content filters.

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user
